column2: ENGLISH
Challenge [Root.GetBestName] to a Duel!
By virtue of your advanced training in a specialist class, you can challenge [Root.GetBestName] to a duel to the death!
Rest
For the cost of 200 piety, [Root.GetBestName] will refresh all of their Class Ability uses.

An enemy has come forth to challenge you. They stare at you with the resolute stare of someone who means to cause your end. Shall you face them? Or shall you give way before them and so ensure that you live to fight another day?

A duel has arisen. Now is the time to prove your mastery of arms, to prove your abilities in the face of combat itself. Will you stand victorious, or will you be remembered as so much dung and dross to the wind?
For Death and Glory
Flee, Flee for your lives!

Choose what action you would like to perform.
 State of character:
 Max hit points: [Root.duel_max_hp.GetValue] Hit points left: [Root.duel_hp.GetValue] 
 Attack Energy: [Root.duel_att.GetValue] Defend Energy: [Root.duel_def.GetValue].

Flee you fools!
Violence flows in the air. [attackloc.GetDuelAction], [attackloc.GetDuelConsequence].\n\n [defendloc.GetDuelAction_1], [defendloc.GetDuelConsequence_1].
Violence flows in the air. [attackloc.GetDuelAction], [attackloc.GetDuelConsequence].\n\n [defendloc.GetDuelAction_1], [defendloc.GetDuelConsequence_1]
With a prepared leap, [attackloc.GetBestName], unleashes a swinging strike at [defendloc.GetBestName].
Landing their strike,[attackloc.GetBestName] inflict's a hearty strike, doing [attackloc.duel_dmg.GetValue] damage and leaving [defendloc.GetBestName] reeling.
With a desperate strike, [attackloc.GetBestName] has barely clipped [defendloc.GetBestName]. With this failure, it is a wonder how long [attackloc.GetBestName] can keep fighting.
With weapons raised high, [attackloc.GetBestName] attempts to avoid all harm.
As [attackloc.GetBestName] has gained their breath, they are sure to be better able to attack.
[attackloc.GetBestName] has sought to flee.
[attackloc.GetBestName]'s terror is palpable. It is clear that [defendloc.GetBestName] is the superior fighter.
[attackloc.GetBestName] weaves magic within themselves, the searing heat coalescing at their fingertips
With an agonized cry, [attackloc.GetBestName]'s magic arcs in all directions, the spell collapsing before it could fully form.
[attackloc.GetBestName]'s' magical assault sears into your enemies flesh, inflicting [attackloc.duel_dmg.GetValue] damage and [defendloc.GetBestName]'s agonies are heard by the Gods.

Your magical assault sears into your enemies flesh, inflicting [attackloc.duel_dmg.GetValue] damage, however, through some strange circumstance, [defendloc.GetBestName] has fought back, resisting the damage done.
Through divine luck, or sheer happenstance, [attackloc.GetBestName]'s' magical assault has failed to damage [defendloc.GetBestName].
[attackloc.GetBestName] weaves magic within themselves, a bubbling shield of mystical blue, flaring to life around them
It is a certain, that [attackloc.GetBestName]'s magical shield shall stand in the face of [defendloc.GetBestName]'s pending assault
[attackloc.GetBestName] weaves magic within themselves, calling upon their mystical power, to harden them in the face of their enemies.
[attackloc.GetBestName]'s magic flows across their skin, turning it to the earthen colour of stone.[defendloc.GetBestName] will need to seriously try to pierce their skin.
[attackloc.GetBestName]'s magic arcs in all directions, the spell collapsing before it could fully form.
With a prepared leap, [defendloc.GetBestName], unleashes a swinging strike at [attackloc.GetBestName].
Landing their strike,[defendloc.GetBestName] inflict's a hearty strike, doing [defendloc.duel_dmg.GetValue] damage and leaving [attackloc.GetBestName] reeling.
With a desperate strike, [defendloc.GetBestName] has barely clipped [attackloc.GetBestName]. With this failure, it is a wonder how long [defendloc.GetBestName] can keep fighting.
With weapons raised high, [defendloc.GetBestName] attempts to avoid all harm.
As [defendloc.GetBestName] has gained their breath, they are sure to be better able to attack.
[defendloc.GetBestName] has sought to flee.
[defendloc.GetBestName]'s terror is palpable. It is clear that [attackloc.GetBestName] is the superior fighter.
[defendloc.GetBestName] weaves magic within themselves, the searing heat coalescing at their fingertips
With an agonized cry, [defendloc.GetBestName]'s magic arcs in all directions, the spell collapsing before it could fully form.
[defendloc.GetBestName]'s magical assault sears into your enemies flesh, inflicting [defendloc.duel_dmg.GetValue] damage and [attackloc.GetBestName]'s agonies are heard by the Gods.

[defendloc.GetBestName]'s magical assault sears into your enemies flesh, inflicting [defendloc.duel_dmg.GetValue] damage, however, through some strange circumstance, [attackloc.GetBestName] has fought back, resisting the damage done.
Through divine luck, or sheer happenstance, [defendloc.GetBestName]'s magical assault has failed to damage [attackloc.GetBestName].
[defendloc.GetBestName] weaves magic within themselves, a bubbling shield of mystical blue, flaring to life around them
It is a certain, that [defendloc.GetBestName]'s magical shield shall stand in the face of [attackloc.GetBestName]'s pending assault
[defendloc.GetBestName] weaves magic within themselves, calling upon their mystical power, to harden them in the face of their enemies.
[defendloc.GetBestName]'s magic flows across their skin, turning it to the earthen colour of stone. [attackloc.GetBestName] will need to seriously try to pierce their skin.
[defendloc.GetBestName]'s magic arcs in all directions, the spell collapsing before it could fully form.

Your enemy launches a depsperate attack. Too weak to parry their blow, you feel the steel of their blade slice you open, recieving [From.duel_dmg.GetValue] damage. Warm blood stains your clothing and you fall to the ground, the life draining from your body. Hearing your enemy's roar of triumph, you give in to the icy grip of death, contemplating the mistakes you have made.
Aaaaargh!

As you press your advantage upon your enemy, you can feel your blows sapping their strength. Launching your final attack, you deal them [Root.duel_dmg.GetValue] damage and cut through their armor, severing their torso in two. Letting out a ferocuious bellow, you sginal your victory to the onlookers and challenge another to take the place of your opponent. None step forward.
Victory for [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]!
You managed to escape from certain death at the hands of your enemy.
I must get away from here!
Your craven enemy has escaped!
Coward! Run back to [From.Capital.GetName]!
